programme.desc: Alice is up for partner at her firm and hires her sister’s manny, Jacob, to help with her daughter.

programme.title: The Boxer and the Butterfly
programme.desc: A dancer and a boxer must team up for a big performance after a last minute drop out.

programme.title: Love's Secret Ingredient
programme.desc: The owner of a struggling market teams up with a celebrity chef to revive each other’s reputations.

programme.title: Heartfelt
programme.desc: Molly hurries to boyfriend Jackson's birthday party with some big news to deliver.

programme.title: Falling For the Competition
programme.desc: A local mom’s and dad’s group clash for the prestigious Modern Parenting Group of the Year award.

programme.title: Hearts Under the Olive Tree
programme.desc: Suffering from writer’s block, an author heads to a farmland retreat to get inspired.

programme.title: Anna Nicole
programme.desc: Biopic of Anna Nicole Smith, Playmate and TV personality, culminates in a tragic fatal drug overdose.

programme.title: Courage
programme.desc: Jason Priestley stars in this inspirational adventure story about courage, love and the power of family.

programme.title: Fatal Performance
programme.desc: A struggling actress is hired to impersonate a woman for a business meeting, but soon finds her life in danger.

programme.title: At Home With Tori
programme.desc: Tori surprises her family with a meal that transports them to Spain.

programme.title: Inspiring Love
programme.desc: When Isla’s art unexpectedly sells to Mark, a second commission sees them falling in love.

programme.title: Just for Showmance
programme.desc: Tara marries Joe, a stranger as part of a TV show, but soon starts to fall for him after all.

programme.title: Let Love Grow
programme.desc: Landscape architect Evie meets her match with new client Ryan, whose daughters are her biggest fan.

programme.title: FBI: Negotiator
programme.desc: An FBI agent must negotiate with a woman holding a hospital hostage in order to get her hands on an experimental drug.

programme.title: Love on Retreat
programme.desc: Sparks fly between Jenny and Nate at a corporate retreat, despite him being her boss’s brother.

programme.title: My Mother's Future Husband
programme.desc: A mother and daughter work through the pain of the past so they can open their hearts to the future.

programme.title: God's Club
programme.desc: Welcome to God's Club: the inspirational story that explores the union of education and faith.

programme.title: Secret Liaison
programme.desc: A woman travels from Los Angeles to Seattle to try to prevent her sister from going to prison for murder.

programme.title: Shogun's Ninja
programme.desc: In the middle of the 16th century, Hideyoshi, a power hungry warlord sets out to destroy the Momochi clan. He sends his war commander in search of the clan's hidden gold only to find that two daggers are the key to the hiding place of the treasured gold. Spanning decades, the quest for the missing daggers takes Shiranui through war and ancient tradition.

programme.desc: Beautiful models are being brutally murdered and an inspector is assigned to the case, but not before more gruesome killings occur. Bava is, as usual, violent and suspenseful.

programme.desc: A writer arrives in Rome only to find that somebody is using his novels as the inspiration and occasionally the means of committing murder. As the death toll mounts the police are more and more baffled, and the writer becomes more closely linked to the case than is comfortable.

programme.title: Banana Joe

On the way he witnesses television, crooks and many delights for the first time as well as falling in love.

programme.title: Lay the Favorite

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: Oren is deliberately mean to the people around him. However, he is forced to change his attitude and take help from his neighbour Leah when he is asked to look after his nine-year-old granddaughter.
